episodes.title: Tony & Susan Alamo and their cult Part 1
episodes.description:
This is part one of my two part series about Tony & Susan Alamo and their cult.

Since I’m only giving a brief over of this story, a great two part series about this cult are by a creator named Sommer Sanchez
Pt 1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CT6ptPAhbBo&t=1179s 
Pt 2 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKsJR9QsbvI 

Sources & Image Credits (this is for non stock images)
https://pastebin.com/Nt65zzEf

Time Stamps
Prologue 00:00-1:55
Who is Tony Alamo? 1:56-4:32
Who is Susan Alamo? 4:33-6:23
The Cult 6:24-17:13
Susan Passes Away 17:14-20:58
Tony Spirals: Celebrity Jackets, Charges, & Arrests 20:59-29:17
Part 1 Conclusion 29:18-30:02
Thank you to patrons and members 30:03-30:17

Report to the FTC https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/
